mapper.insert: insert into orderfrom (orderId, order_type, order_number, commodityname, commodityweight, sender, mailingaddress, shippingaddress, state, postphone, consignee, consigneenumber, startingcity, middlecity, terminationcity, transportprice, shippingprice, yunshuprice, price, vehicle, note ) values (#{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityweight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mailingaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shippingaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{postphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consigneenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startingcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{middlecity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminationcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transportprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shippingprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{yunshuprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select orderId, order_type, order_number, commodityname, commodityweight, sender, mailingaddress, shippingaddress, state, postphone, consignee, consigneenumber, startingcity, middlecity, terminationcity, transportprice, shippingprice, yunshuprice, price, vehicle, note from orderfrom
